name: Start the Party! Save the World
name_original: Start the Party! Save the World
description:
Your PlayStation®Move motion controller is about to turn into some of the craziest gadgets imaginable in Start the Party!™ Save the World on the PlayStation®3 system. From the depths of the ocean to skyscraper rooftops, Dr. Terrible is wreaking havoc - pick up your motion controller and battle with this devious enemy.

- Grab your PlayStation®Move motion controller and prepare to battle Dr. Terrible in a series of hilarious mini-games.
- See yourself on-screen as you use your motion controller to scoop up fish, swat flies and rescue lost divers.
- Challenge up to three friends on PS3™, take down an evil villain and save the world in four different game modes.

PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye required (sold separately).

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service, this item’s use restrictions, and other applicable terms located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item.



One-time fee for downloads to up to two systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
